content.rendered:
Fifth Canadian Chopin Piano Competition

Senior Division

1st prize      Lingfei (Stephan) Xie
2nd prize    Eric Guo
3rd prize    Agne Radzeviciute
                      Jessica Yuma

Best Concerto      Eric Guo
Best  Mazurka     Eric Guo
Best Polonaise     Jessica Yuma

 

Junior Division

1st prize      Catherine He
2nd prize    Matthieu Foresi
3rd prize    Jason Cheng

Most Promising Junior      Huy Dang
